img_summary: The image depicts a torn, aged document resembling a formula or recipe sheet, likely for crafting items in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the context, it is associated with various in-game formulas for medicinal or enhancement items, such as "Tonifying Decoction," "Body-Fleeting Powder," "Enhanced Ginseng Pellets," and "Mirage Pill." These formulas are found in specific locations or questlines, suggesting their importance in gameplay progression and item crafting.
